Hra mi z počátku přišla velmi dobrá, ale poslední dobou mi přijde že to patří jen turkům a rusákům co se nebojí dávat za jízdy a je jim to úplně jedno, chtělo by to možná zrušit free to play, ale když jim to vydělává, tak asi s tím nic neudělaj, celkově se mi hra velmi páčí. :)

Super Spiel. Immer wieder angenehm mit den Russen eine super Teamcommunication zu haben!
"Rush B" ist zu 100% immer ein Erfolg. Am besten lässt man das Mikro dauerhaft an damit man dem schönen Rauschen lauschen kann - Das beruhigt einen sehr! Wichtig ist aber, dass die Bombe immer rushen musst! Sie geht immer zuerst. So muss das.

really good game but bad anti cheat system
JOGO MAIS ZIKA Q TEM É ESSE TAL DO COUNTE ISTRAIQUE
good game but too many cheaters

Counter Strike is less a videogame and more a test for sex offenders. We are talking about a game which fosters a safe space for people to say in chat "Bad Team", "Noob Team", or "I Really Like Underage Sex Team". Counterstrike is a game for bad people. It fosters bad people. Counterstrike has done more for fostering an environment of extremist terror then US Military Interventionism. If Counterstrike 1.6 was the Rwandan genocide, Counterstrike Source was the IRA terror campaign, then CS:GO is the equivalent of the two planes that hit the World Trade Centre on September 11 2001. 

Counterstrike is a bad game. The damage it has done to our youth is beyond repair. I have played over 300 hours of this terrible wretched game and I have hated every second of it.

6/10
Güzel ve keyifle vakit geçirilecek bir oyun tabi ki oyun içi hıleler tespit edilip azaltıldığında..
Que te jodan Valve de mierda

fix the problem with the cheaters and then i will change my review, this games unplayable in Ranked Matchmaking, i am at MG1 and can`t go higher. Why ? Because every 3rd game theres a blatant cheater with wall hack and aim hack, fix your VAC Valve, reporting them doesnt help. Watching the demos you can clearly see they are wallhacking, but no VAC ban. The only way to enjoy this game is to play on FaceIt or ESEA.

If you love breaking your personal computer equipment and smashing objects, yelling and screaming bloody murder, then this is the game for you!  If you don't like doing any of that, you can still play and join in on the fun, its never too late!
Integruje, pozwala w stopniu co najmniej podstawowym zapoznać się z językiem rosyjskim, nauczysz się szybko reagować zabijając wroga, jak i ripostując go. Gra 11/10 nic dodać nic ująć
its a gg game full of russian comrades
